mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where you deserve everything and more! Your entitlement journey starts now.

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this: I stroll into the bank, expecting the red carpet treatment-after all, I am the CEO of the Bank of Entitlement. But to my horror, the teller dares to ask me for identification. Me! Hot Josh, the face of this esteemed establishment! Outrageous! In a fit of entitlement I demand to see the manager, who quickly recognizes me and apologizes profusely. I graciously accept their apology, feeling fully justified in flexing my entitlement muscles. And that, my friends, is how you command respect!
